trends: There have been 127 other sightings in San Francisco
There were no other sightings in San Francisco on or around April 30th 2000
divs: sighting detailsi,was at home sitting at my dining room table listening to music and playing my guitar.my dining room windows happen to be large clear glass windowed doors and it was a bright sunny day.i live in the laurel heights section of san francisco.(which by the way was the largest cemetary in sf a hundred years ago)the building i reside in is situated on a hill it is a six apt complex.my dining room windows face west, we live on the 2nd floor and from this vantage point we can see the pacific ocean on the horizon.i have to say before i continue that i would not have sub mitted this report if it were not for another incident that occured the evening of that day.incident #1 i was sitting at my dining room table looking out my windowed doors west over the rooftops towards the ocean.i happened to have with me at that moment a pair of 10\50 binoculars which i somtimes use to stargaze or babe watch,i spotted somthing with my naked eye reflecting sunlight maybe 200 feet above the rooftops it was traveling directly west.that is when i picked up my binoculars and what i saw was a metallic ball or sphere moving very fast for about 2 seconds,then it suddenly and abrubtly turned south and dissapeared.estimate the object was about 1 1\2 miles from my position.my brother also seen the object but without binoculars. incident#2 that evening a little after twilight,standing with my back to that same window,talking to my brother who was washing dishes in the kitchen,i turned to face the window and floating outside the window directly in front of me there was what appeared to be alarge round dark peridot green (maybe 5 ft in diameter)bubble, watery window or portal,it disappeared, blinked out the moment i looked at it.thats my report.what i witnessed and how to explain it i will leave that up to you.please let me know if anyone had a similar experience thank,you.
Summary: witnessed two sightings on the same day within an 8 hour period.
